title: Ideas to improve friends list
body:
I have 2 main ideas I think would be fantastic which I will highlight below

1st Improvement to game display info
I think this could use just a little modification to show more info to friends to entice spectating and discussion of games.
My idea would be to add kda and team score to the already existing info to make it a little more fulfilling

Template
Map (Ranked or Unranked) - Champion - KDA - Team Score - Time

Example
Summoner's Rift (Ranked) - Lucian     6/1/2  20 vs 18     18:42



2nd Gameplay highlights
This idea is to promote exciting things happening in your current game (eg. triple kill or above) with the option to then spectate from about 30 seconds before the event to activate to encourage people to watch cool things happening in friends games

Example

Name on the right hand side friends list is flashing and upon hover over you see a penta kill icon on that giant blank space next to the name on the right hand side of the pop up box

You now have the ability to right click and click spectate from event

I think this feature would be even cooler if rather then spectate the game itself you could just view the event only in client rather then having to go into a spectator game client but not sure how feasible that would be at this current stage



So what do you guys think would love some feedback on the ideas whether you like them or not, or if you have any changes/improvements to add

replies.body: Another idea I will add... When logging in the client asks you what are the two positions you like to play (or the client recognises the two positions you play the most) so when someone hovers over your name in the friends list they can see what position you like to play. This would make parties easier to construct. There has been so many games where in a party three people want to go mid, or that the normal lobby is just so chaotic. I also think it would encourage gameplay with friends.

I like both ideas.

For the game improvement info, I would want different coloured text or some separation between the different fields of Champion, KDA, Team Score, TIme.

About the game highlight one, that'd be really cool, though that could require updates to how they currently handle spectator mode and/or connections between the client, and the game. Some third party programs already offer instant replays of deaths in-game or similar.

i agree with you on both points

Separation and colour would be neccessary

As for the highlights feasibility is my biggest concern about it as well but I think with enough effort or resources put in it could be done
